content: I tried unsuccessfully to enter my phone number, receiving a notice that said an existing account already uses that number. I was unable to find anothert account in Discord. Any thoughts on what to try?

I reached out to support
I emailed them
Still waiting to hear back but they are.working on it
Hi <@1283212503446323262> can you log out of Discord and then log back in using your phone number, and password, or click forgot password if you don't know it.
it can take a few minutes to get the PW reset message.
Wouldn't let me log back in using my phone number, only email.

okay that means there really isn't an existing account, with that phone number. 
Are you using Discord mobile, desktop app, or in browser?
is your number a 10-digit mobile number? not VOIP or landline.

okay
try these steps https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413460214807-How-to-Remove-a-Phone-Number#h_01FQFTDJQP5D3XMMSDT3CJQGPR and if that doesn't work, get a support ticket https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Good luck. Another way to deal with this is use another phone number, maybe you have a family member who isn't using discord and is willing to let you verify with their number. You only need the phone number once. (if you never log out  you'll be fine)
Using someone else's phone number worked!
